pr_title: Implement additional serialization methods for Spark shuffle

timeline.author: wenleix

replies.bodyText: Unfortunately this method is not defined in the interface (in the opensource version)
replies.author: arhimondr

timeline.bodyText: curious: when the PrestoSparkMutableRow will be backed by ByteBuffer and when it will be backed by byte[]? -- maybe add a comment to explain it?
timeline.author: wenleix

replies.bodyText: I will be backed by byte[] only when deserialized with public <T> T deserialize(byte[] array, int offset, int length, ClassTag<T> classTag)
replies.author: arhimondr

timeline.bodyText: when the mutable row is backed by ByteBuffer, will length be set correctly?
timeline.author: wenleix

replies.bodyText: No. offset is length is set only when it is backed by the byte[]
replies.author: arhimondr

timeline.message: Implement additional serialization methods for Spark shuffle
Implement additional serialization methods for Spark shuffle
